text.title: NULab's Twitter Community
text.more: This is a graph of the combined egonets for all people at the NULab with a bit of extra on top - if more than three people in the NULab follow any particular account, they are included in this graph. This step is done so that a NULab-centric view can be taken rather than the noisy and highly connected world of Twitter generally speaking. Size of Nodes is based on Betweenness Centrality, a basic measure of how much of a "broker" an individual is.
text.intro: Who at the NULab is following whom on Twitter
